mapper.insert: insert into store (name, logo, description, address, phone, avg_price, sale_from, sale_to, category, user_id) values (#{name}, #{logo}, #{description}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{avg_price}, #{sale_from}, #{sale_to}, #{category}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: select store_id, name, logo, description, created_at, address, phone, avg_price, sale_from, sale_to, category, user_id from store where user_id = #{user_id}
